# Conceptos básicos del álgebra de matrices {#sec-data-transform}

Matriz de datos

$$
X=
\begin{bmatrix}
 x_{11} \ x_{12}\ \cdots\ x_{1p} \\ 
 x_{21}\ x_{22}\ \cdots\ x_{2p} \\ 
 \vdots\,\,\,\,\,\,\,\,\,   \vdots\,\,\,\,   \ddots\,\,\,\, \vdots \\ 
 x_{n1} \ x_{n2} \ \cdots \ x_{np} 
\end{bmatrix}
$$
